thread.section_title: YesStyle.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of YesStyle.com | www.yesstyle.com
thread.title: Teresa Truong

author: Teresa Truong
title: Teresa Truong
text: There's wide variety of different items to choose from, from many different brands and countries. Quality is great in most of the items I buy, and quality is so-so for some of the items. Shipping times vary, most of the time it has taken a while for standard shipping, but they do offer free express shipping if you buy over a certain amount. They also have frequent promotions and a discount reward program as well. They always have new items released and always offer promotions, which is what keeps me coming back to buy more
